game.name: Bindary
game.shortDescription: Two escaped robots. One chain. One stolen ship. Navigate deadly obstacles while physically connected to your partner. One wrong move dooms you both. Coordinate perfectly or crash spectacularly. Your escape starts now.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Two escaped robots. One chain. One stolen ship. Navigate deadly obstacles while physically connected to your partner. One wrong move dooms you both. Coordinate perfectly or crash spectacularly. Your escape starts now.
